Path to the/confdirectory that includes the static content.
html:
Parameter

Description

DOCKER_REGISTRY

Path to the registry of Docker images. If you deploy the bundling service from local cache, leave the parameter blank.

DOCKER_TAG_SERVICE,
DOCKER_TAG_WATCHER

Current versions of the bundling service components provided by Creatio support.

ContentPath

Path to the /conf directory that includes the static content.
